markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Jade Bauble](/Equipment.aspx?ID=222)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 568 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a melee weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>command</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You are a master with the affixed weapon
</row>

</column>

---

This bit of jade is usually carved in the shape of a duelist, or sometimes a multi-armed creature. When you activate the bauble, it magically draws the attention of foes. Until the start of your next turn, enemies within the reach of the weapon the talisman is affixed to are flat-footed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Jade Bauble
requirement: You are a master with the affixed weapon
requirement_markdown: You are a master with the affixed weapon

text: <title level="1" right="Item 8" pfs="Standard" > Jade Bauble Source Core Rulebook pg. 568 4.0 Price 100 gp Usage affixed to a melee weapon Activate Single Action command Requirement You are a master with the affixed weapon --- This bit of jade is usually carved in the shape of a duelist, or sometimes a multi-armed creature. When you activate the bauble, it magically draws the attention of foes. Until the start of your next turn, enemies within the reach of the weapon the talisman is affixed to are flat-footed.
